channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Slipping on ICE: innocent retailers are the latest collateral damage from Trump’s perpetual noise machine
item.description: ICE is slipping on a puddle of its own making. Let's not put the rest of our crucial nationwide retailers on shaky footing.

item.title: Jamie Dimon tells Davos: ‘You didn’t do a particularly good job making the world a better place’
item.description: "What the hell else do you want me to say?"

item.title: Nearly 400 millionaires and billionaires across 24 countries are demanding Davos leaders to tax them more: ‘Tax us. Tax the super rich.’

item.title: Jensen Huang says AI bubble fears are dwarfed by ‘the largest infrastructure buildout in human history’

item.title: Trump’s AI deal for Silicon Valley: Build your own nuclear, skip years of regulation
